resources.string: Emergency SOS with community-based rapid response
Your personal safety companion with community-powered emergency response
Send emergency alerts instantly to your trusted contacts and nearby verified helpers
Verified volunteers within 5-10 km radius receive your SOS and can reach you quickly
Share your live location with responders and track help arriving to you
All users are verified through Aadhaar OTP for a safe and trustworthy community
We need a few permissions to keep you safe. These are essential for the app to function properly.
Sign in to continue to SafeGuard
How would you like to use SafeGuard?
Select how you want to use SafeGuard SOS
Send SOS alerts and get help in emergencies
Receive nearby alerts and help others in need
Send alerts and help others - complete protection
We verify all users through Aadhaar to maintain a safe community
Your Aadhaar details are encrypted and never stored on our servers
Aadhaar verification helps us ensure that all users and helpers are genuine, creating a safe and trustworthy community for everyone.
Your Aadhaar is encrypted and stored securely. We use it only for identity verification.
We verify your Aadhaar to ensure the safety and authenticity of our community. This helps prevent misuse and ensures genuine help reaches those in need.
To ensure safety and reliability in our emergency network, we verify all users and helpers using Aadhaar.
OTP expired. Please request a new one.
OTP sent to Aadhaar linked mobile %s
Enter your registered email to receive reset instructions
Reset link sent to your email
Don\'t worry! Enter your email or phone number and we\'ll send you a reset link.
We\'ll send a password reset link to your email
We\'ll send a password reset code to your phone
We\'ve sent a password reset link to %s
We\'ve sent a password reset code to %s
Are you sure you want to logout?
Turn on to help others in need
Please enable Helper Mode to receive alerts
Press and hold to activate SOS
Are you sure you\'re safe now?
Multiple false alarms may affect your account
Hold the button to trigger SOS
No sound or vibration during alert
This will send a test notification to your contacts. No helpers will be notified.
You have an active SOS alert
We need location permission to share your location during emergencies.
Location permission denied. SOS may not work properly.
Helpers are coming to your location
Are you sure you want to cancel the SOS alert? Helpers will be notified that you no longer need assistance.
This will notify all helpers that you are now safe and no longer need assistance.
I need help! My location: https://maps.google.com/?q=%f,%f
I\'m responding to your SOS. Stay calm, help is on the way!
Join our community of verified helpers
By registering, you agree to respond promptly and responsibly to SOS alerts
You are responding to this alert
When someone nearby needs help, you\'ll see their alert here.
Join our community of verified helpers and make a difference. Help others in emergencies and earn badges.
You\'re about to respond to %s\'s emergency. You\'ll be navigated to their location.
Helper mode requires location access to receive nearby alerts and navigate to people in need.
No active alerts in your area right now.
You have arrived at the location
Are you sure you want to cancel your response? The person in need will be notified.
You\'re still marked as responding. Do you want to exit navigation?
I\'m on my way to help you. Stay calm!
When someone nearby needs help, you\'ll see their alert here.
I\'m on my way to help you. My ETA is %s. Stay calm!
Confirm your arrival at the victim\'s location?
Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
Maximum number of emergency contacts reached
This information will be shared with helpers during emergencies
This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
SafeGuard SOS is developed by a dedicated team committed to community safety.
We need location access to send your position during emergencies and notify nearby helpers.
Allow background location to keep tracking during active SOS even when app is minimized.
Required to make emergency calls and send SMS alerts.
Allows sending SMS alerts to emergency contacts when internet is unavailable.
Import emergency contacts directly from your phone.
Record audio during emergencies for evidence.
Record video during emergencies and update profile photo.
Receive important SOS alerts and updates.
Permission denied permanently. Please enable from settings.
SafeGuard SOS needs location permission to send your location during emergencies and notify nearby helpers. Notification permission is needed to receive alerts.
A helper is responding to your SOS
Helper has arrived at your location
Notifications for your active SOS alerts
Receive alerts when someone nearby needs help
Updates about helpers responding to your alerts
Your emergency alert has been sent
Your test alert was sent successfully
Your emergency alert is active. Tap to view status.
Used for background location tracking during emergencies
Your location is being shared for safety
Emergency alert is active. Trusted contacts and nearby helpers have been notified.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Network error. Please check your connection.
Please enter a valid phone number
Please enter a valid email address
Password must be at least 8 characters
Please enter a valid 12-digit Aadhaar number
Login failed. Please check your credentials.
This phone number is already registered
Failed to send SOS. Please try again.
Please add at least one emergency contact

How would you like to use SafeGuard SOS?
Your account has been created successfully. You are now part of the SafeGuard community.
One-tap SOS is ready to use
Your identity is verified via Aadhaar
